Annotation_Schema_TAZ_v1.0.TEXT: [s0] Griffin: I think we should kick things off with a little bit of initiative. [s1] I think we should take initiative in this new podcast episode we're recording. [s2] Travis: I'm excited, this is my first time rolling my new dice. [s3] Griffin: What are they, whalebone? [s4] Travis: No, I got a beautiful translucent green emerald kind of thing. [s5] [rolls] [s6] Justin: Aw, now they got stank on them! [s7] Griffin: You got that elephant dick bone...carved-- [s8] Travis: And I rolled... a 15! [s9] Good start! [s10] Griffin: Good work, dice! [s11] Clint: I rolled a 15, but I roll another one. [s12] Travis: That's 17 total for me. [s13] Clint: Oh. [s14] Right. [s15] I rolled a 15, plus... nothing. [s16] Justin: It's 12 for cha'boy. [s17] Clint: Huh? [s18] Justin: 12... for cha'boy. [s19] Griffin: Cha'boy gets 12... [s20] I just wrote 12. [s21] That's not your name, your name's Taako. [s22] Justin: Yeah. [s23] Who- All right, okay. [s24] Griffin: How are you guys doing, while I roll four different initiatives? [s25] Travis: Good, good. [s26] Justin: I think you can just round up, in the rules, the official rules, you just round-- average them, right? [s27] Griffin: Yeah, sure, why not. [s28] So first in the order... well, before we do anything, these robots are just kind of cackling maniacally at you? [s29] Travis: Mmhm. [s30] I cackle right back! [s31] A backle! [s32] Hahahahahaha! [s33] Griffin: Now you're having a cackle battle? [s34] Travis: A cack-off. [s35] Griffin: The one with a cannon for an arm says, [s36] Magic Brian: I've gotta say, I am so psyched for this rematch. [s37] I have been looking forward to this for, well, since I was vanquished. [s38] And I gotta say, I'm so glad to be here with you two bros! [s39] My two main men, Jenkins and Maarvey! [s40] I'm just so psyched to have this opportunity to whoop some, to whoop, to whoop their rudey-poo asses with you! [s41] Let's just have a good clean fight, and may the best robot win, I suppose! [s42] Magnus: Magic B? [s43] Magic Brian: Yes? [s44] Clint: Break! [s45] Magnus: Are you a ghost in the machine? [s46] Magic Brian: It would seem that way. [s47] You kicked me very good. [s48] I remember the following. [s49] I cast a magic missile at you, Taako, and then you cast one back at me, and our friendship, our budding friendship was betrayed. [s59] You go there and you just kind of float around in a big pool made up of like, the sort of collective memories of everyone who's ever lived. [s60] It's like-- it's pretty chill actually.
